instructions: When you re at the airport or shopping mall, open Maps. Tap the Tracking Off button to show your current location. Tap Look Inside. To find nearby services, tap a category (like Food, Restrooms, or Clothes) at the bottom or left side of the screen, then swipe up to see all results, listed alphabetically. To see more information about a result, tap it. To see a map of a different floor, tap the button showing the floor level (zoom in if you don t see the button).
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google Maps app . You ll see a blue dot, which shows where you are. If you don t see a blue dot, go to the bottom right and tap Your location .

On your iPhone or iPad, open the Settings app. Tap Privacy and then Location Services . Make sure the switch next to Location Services is green. Scroll down and select Google Maps . Choose While Using the App or Always . Note : Location History works best when Location Services is set to Always .
